Overworld Pigman Towerä¸»ä¸–ç•ŒçŒªäººå¡”Â  Â Â  Â Â Â As we all know, since the 1.16 update, the consumption of gold ingots and other gold items has increased, and in the past, gold ingots have become a burden for some players.

Â  Â Â  Â â‘£ Make a killing device, put a honey block in the middle, put a cube in the lower left and right corners of the honey block, and connect a high-frequency piston next to it. Note that it is an ordinary piston! Place tridents on the squares in the lower left and right corners. The more the better, there is a killing module that is placed down to kill the cubs. (After the trident is pushed and pulled several times, if it is not facing the picture, then turn left 90 degrees or right 90 degrees.)

Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â  â‘¤ Next, we will make a sorting device. Put a half brick on the last one to make the falling objects flow down. Remember to put a block in front of the costume to prevent the water from flowing too fast and the falling objects flying out. Then the current turned a corner to speed up the classification. The classification system is a bit difficult, so please look at the picture first, or import the archive I posted below into the game for reference.

Â  Â Â  Â Â  Â  â‘¥ Then we will make a rapid fire device, first according to the picture, two investigators face to face, produce high frequency, and then connect the investigator behind, forming a high frequency circuit. Then put the workbench next to the scout (because the workbench will be ignited, but will not be burned), put another row of workbenches on the workbench, pour magma in the middle, and the rapid fire device is ready.Â  Â Â  Â Â Â â‘¥ç„¶åæˆ‘ä»¬æ¥åšå¿«é€Ÿèµ·ç«è£…ç½®ï¼Œå…ˆæŒ‰å›¾ç‰‡é‚£æ ·å­ï¼Œä¸¤ä¸ªä¾¦æŸ¥è€…é¢å¯¹é¢ï¼Œäº§ç”Ÿé«˜é¢‘ï¼Œç„¶ååœ¨åé¢ä¹Ÿæ¥ä¸Šä¾¦æŸ¥è€…ï¼Œå½¢æˆä¸€æ¡é«˜é¢‘çº¿è·¯ã€‚ç„¶ååœ¨ä¾¦æŸ¥è€…è¾¹ä¸Šæ”¾ä¸Šå·¥ä½œå°ï¼ˆå› ä¸ºå·¥ä½œå°è™½ç„¶ä¼šè¢«ç‚¹ç‡ƒï¼Œä½†æ˜¯ä¸ä¼šè¢«çƒ§æ¯ï¼‰åœ¨å·¥ä½œå°ä¸Šå†æ”¾ä¸€æ’å·¥ä½œå°ï¼Œä¸­é—´å€’ä¸Šå²©æµ†ï¼Œå¿«é€Ÿèµ·ç«è£…ç½®å°±åšå¥½äº†ã€‚
